title: Uraš Gate
description: The Uraš Gate is one of Babylon's eight city gates and it is situated on the southeastern side of the inner city, directly south of the Šuanna quarter. King Nebuchadnezzar II built the gate ca. 575 B.C.

properties.description: Coordinates are based placement of the gate in Koldewey's carefully drawn excavation plans of Babylon and satellite imagery showing the visible ruins of Imgur-Enlil.
properties.title: Imagery location of the Urash Gate at Babylon
